description: This file contains CSS rules for managing themes and styling the main application components, including definitions for light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with centering and background color management based on the theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including size and animation for branding.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the application, including background, alignment, and size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, adjusting color transitions based on the theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles between light and dark themes, including animations and responsive adjustments.
